text: The Road () is a 1955 Soviet action movie directed by Aleksandr Stolper.Самый русский человек: Евгений Леонов умел заставлять зрителей плакать и смеятьсяДОРОГА (1955) It stars Andrei Popov, Vitaly Doronin, and Nikolai Gritsenko. ==Actors== * Andrei Popov as Sergei Ignatyevich Baitalin * Vitaly Doronin as Fyodor Ivanovich * Nikolai Gritsenko as Ivan Alekseyevich * Tamara Loginova as Yekaterina Andreyevna Fyodorova * Lev Sverdlin as Beimbetov * Viktor Avdyushko as Vasya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1955 movies Category:1950s action movies Category:Soviet action movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Stolper
title: The Road (1955 movie)
